definition: to proofread/to revise one or more editions of a text using an authoritative edition as a source book/to editorially revise a text
to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House

sentences.english: Checking the versions of Dream of the Red Chamber is a demanding task.
sentences.chinese: 參校《紅樓夢》是一件相當繁瑣的事。
